short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to subvert the Naples Daily News payment wall

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was written over a cup of coffee on a Sunday morning, and is intended for educational purposes only. Use this extension at your own risk.
